text: hak phwk cea thakhwam di phwk cea k tha pheux taw khxng cea xeng læa hakwa phwk cea thakhwam chaw k pheux taw xeng dangnan meux sayya xik khx hnung di ma thung pheux phwk khea kx khwam xabxay khay hna kæ phwk cea læa pheux kheapi nı masyid chen thi phwk khea di kheapi læw nı khrang ræk læa pheux thalay sing thi phwk khea di chaychna xyang hmd sin
